name: Temple of the Dead Free - 3D FPS Game
name_original: Temple of the Dead Free - 3D FPS Game
description:
Walk around a deadly temple and find your way to find the treasure room filled with gold and jewels. Many brave men have already tried before and died in this temple. The skeletons of those died here will try to protect the temple and attack you.

Mission:
- Find your way through the temple maze
- Shoot and kill the attacking skeletons
- Find the treasure room

How to Play:
- Drag your finger on screen to rotate and look left, right, up and down.
- Use the stick button to walk in any direction
- Tap the fire button to shoot and kill
- You have unlimited bullets to fire
- Keep an eye on your health bar
- Take health box to improve your health
